chapters.title: Prologue: Deceptive Appearances
chapters.info: Aisling Noon, p. 22 (9)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She served as advisor to King Easar of Shienar until she disappeared when news of Elaida's rise to power arrived. She is a rarity among the Aes Sedai: one of the Tuatha'an, the Traveling People. She is very tall. She spent five years as a novice, and was raised to the Accepted the same year as Siuan and Moiraine. See also Togita, Easar.
